ygData.subject: Re: XP question
ygData.msgSnippet: according to the expanded players book it says that humans get additional xp. ... From: Juan Custer  To:
ygData.messageBody:
according to the expanded players book it says that humans get additional
xp.
----- Original Message -----
From: Juan Custer <JuanC@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, May 28, 1999 10:42 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] XP question


> From: Juan Custer <JuanC@...>
>
>
> Are you sure? I'm almost positive humans get a 20-25% XP bonus. on
> the average they usually have the lowest stats and no infra/ultravision.
> Hybrid classes ALSO get an XP penalty though. Thus being a Dark Elf
> Shadowknight would suck perhaps, but when he finally did catch up to that
> Human Shadowknight he'd be more powerful thanks to better stats...
perhaps.
>
> Malark
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: ccc@... [mailto:ccc@...]
> > Sent: Friday, May 28, 1999 12:34 PM
> > To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] XP question
> >
> >
> > From: ccc@...
> >
> >
> > Actually you are incorrect my friend. Other classes and
> > Hybrids get a penalty humans
> > recieve no penalty because they are the neutral race.
> > Niuban
> > Bertoxx
> >
> >
